item.title: Pollster Frank Luntz: THIS debate line scored highest in 20-year history of focus group - BizPac Review
item.description:
Pollster Frank Luntz: THIS debate line scored highest in 20-year history of focus group - BizPac Review

After running focus groups for nearly 20 years, pollster Frank Luntz said "I've never tested in any primary debate a line that scored as well as this." He said that it demonstrated what was wrong with both the CNBC moderators as well as the media.
